name: Shivarok

signature_move.name: Sacred Crush
signature_move.description: A devastating stone attack that may lower the target's Attack and Defense stats

pokedex_entry: Ancient guardians that stand vigil at sacred mountain temples, Shivarok are said to awaken only when great evil threatens the land. Their stone manes flow like cascading prayer flags, and their roar can be heard echoing through the highest peaks. Legend claims they were carved from the very stones of the world's tallest mountains.
image_prompt: Rock/Fighting type, temple guardian lion, quadruped, gold and red and white colored, inspired by Nepalese culture, Himalayan mythology, Buddhist and Hindu influences, temple architecture, prayer flags, snow leopard, yak, rhododendron
